en.title: Daily Life Guide - CERN Starter Pack
en.description: Daily life hub for CERN newcomers: housing, banking, transport, shopping, schools, and practical tips for Geneva and Pays de Gex.

og.title: Daily Life Guide - CERN Starter Pack
og.description: Practical daily life resources for CERN employees living near Geneva.

en.heading: Daily Life Near CERN
en.intro: Practical guides for settling in and navigating daily life in the Geneva and Pays de Gex region.
en.alertText: Most services differ between Switzerland and France. Check which country you live in before following any guide.

es.title: Guia de Vida Cotidiana - CERN Starter Pack
es.description: Centro de vida cotidiana para recien llegados al CERN: vivienda, banca, transporte, compras, colegios y consejos practicos para Ginebra y Pays de Gex.

og.title: Guia de Vida Cotidiana - CERN Starter Pack
og.description: Recursos practicos de vida cotidiana para empleados del CERN cerca de Ginebra.

es.heading: Vida Cotidiana Cerca del CERN
es.intro: Guias practicas para instalarse y navegar la vida diaria en la region de Ginebra y Pays de Gex.
es.alertText: La mayoria de servicios difieren entre Suiza y Francia. Comprueba en que pais vives antes de seguir cualquier guia.

it.title: Guida alla Vita Quotidiana - CERN Starter Pack
it.description: Hub sulla vita quotidiana per i nuovi arrivati al CERN: alloggio, banca, trasporti, shopping, scuole e consigli pratici per Ginevra e il Pays de Gex.

og.title: Guida alla Vita Quotidiana - CERN Starter Pack
og.description: Risorse pratiche sulla vita quotidiana per i dipendenti del CERN che vivono vicino a Ginevra.

it.heading: Vita Quotidiana Vicino al CERN
it.intro: Guide pratiche per stabilirsi e orientarsi nella vita quotidiana nella regione di Ginevra e del Pays de Gex.
it.alertText: La maggior parte dei servizi differisce tra Svizzera e Francia. Verifica in quale paese risiedi prima di seguire qualsiasi guida.

fr.title: Guide de la Vie Quotidienne - CERN Starter Pack
fr.description: Hub de la vie quotidienne pour les nouveaux arrivants au CERN : logement, banque, transports, courses, ecoles et conseils pratiques pour Geneve et le Pays de Gex.

og.title: Guide de la Vie Quotidienne - CERN Starter Pack
og.description: Ressources pratiques pour la vie quotidienne des employes du CERN pres de Geneve.

fr.heading: Vie Quotidienne Pres du CERN
fr.intro: Guides pratiques pour s'installer et naviguer la vie quotidienne dans la region de Geneve et du Pays de Gex.
fr.alertText: La plupart des services different entre la Suisse et la France. Verifiez dans quel pays vous vivez avant de suivre un guide.

desc.en: Switzerland vs France, popular areas, rental tips, and finding accommodation near CERN.
desc.es: Suiza vs Francia, zonas populares, consejos de alquiler y busqueda de alojamiento cerca del CERN.
desc.it: Svizzera vs Francia, zone popolari, consigli per l'affitto e come trovare alloggio vicino al CERN.
desc.fr: Suisse vs France, quartiers populaires, conseils de location et comment trouver un logement pres du CERN.

desc.en: Opening Swiss and French bank accounts, required documents, on-site banks, and salary payment.
desc.es: Abrir cuentas en Suiza y Francia, documentos necesarios, bancos en el CERN y pago de salario.
desc.it: Aprire conti bancari svizzeri e francesi, documenti richiesti, banche in loco e pagamento dello stipendio.
desc.fr: Ouvrir des comptes bancaires suisses et francais, documents requis, banques sur place et versement du salaire.

desc.en: Bus 68, Tram 18, CERN shuttle, bike paths, commuting options, and parking at CERN.
desc.es: Bus 68, Tram 18, lanzadera del CERN, carriles bici, opciones de desplazamiento y aparcamiento.
desc.it: Bus 68, Tram 18, navetta CERN, piste ciclabili, opzioni di pendolarismo e parcheggio al CERN.
desc.fr: Bus 68, Tram 18, navette CERN, pistes cyclables, options de trajet et stationnement au CERN.

desc.en: French supermarkets, savings tips, customs limits, and Sunday opening hours.
desc.es: Supermercados franceses, consejos de ahorro, limites aduaneros y horarios dominicales.
desc.it: Supermercati francesi, consigli per risparmiare, limiti doganali e orari di apertura domenicali.
desc.fr: Supermarches francais, astuces pour economiser, limites douanieres et horaires d'ouverture le dimanche.

desc.en: CERN creche, local nurseries, international schools, and education options for families.
desc.es: Guarderia del CERN, guarderias locales, colegios internacionales y opciones educativas.
desc.it: Asilo nido CERN, asili locali, scuole internazionali e opzioni educative per le famiglie.
desc.fr: Creche du CERN, garderies locales, ecoles internationales et options educatives pour les familles.

desc.en: Electricity, gas, water, internet providers, and setup timelines in Switzerland and France.
desc.es: Electricidad, gas, agua, proveedores de internet y plazos de instalacion en Suiza y Francia.
desc.it: Elettricita, gas, acqua, provider internet e tempistiche di attivazione in Svizzera e Francia.
desc.fr: Electricite, gaz, eau, fournisseurs internet et delais d'installation en Suisse et en France.

desc.en: Restaurants R1/R2/R3, cafeterias, Medical Service, banking, postal, and emergency contacts.
desc.es: Restaurantes R1/R2/R3, cafeterias, Servicio Medico, banca, correos y emergencias.
desc.it: Ristoranti R1/R2/R3, caffetterie, Servizio Medico, banca, posta e contatti di emergenza.
desc.fr: Restaurants R1/R2/R3, cafeterias, Service Medical, banque, poste et contacts d'urgence.

desc.en: Green plate eligibility, tax-free vehicle import, customs, license exchange, and insurance.
desc.es: Elegibilidad de placas verdes, importacion libre de impuestos, aduanas, canje de carnet y seguro.
desc.it: Idoneita per le targhe verdi, importazione veicoli esentasse, dogana, conversione patente e assicurazione.
desc.fr: Eligibilite aux plaques vertes, importation de vehicule hors taxes, douanes, echange de permis et assurance.

desc.en: CERN language courses, Welcome Club classes, local associations, and conversation exchange.
desc.es: Cursos de idiomas del CERN, clases del Welcome Club, asociaciones locales e intercambio conversacional.
desc.it: Corsi di lingua del CERN, lezioni del Welcome Club, associazioni locali e scambio conversazionale.
desc.fr: Cours de langues du CERN, cours du Welcome Club, associations locales et echange conversationnel.

desc.en: Staff Association, Welcome Club, 70+ activity courses, sports, cultural clubs, and networking.
desc.es: Asociacion de Personal, Welcome Club, 70+ cursos, clubes deportivos, culturales y networking.
desc.it: Staff Association, Welcome Club, oltre 70 corsi di attivita, sport, club culturali e networking.
desc.fr: Association du Personnel, Welcome Club, plus de 70 cours d'activites, sports, clubs culturels et networking.

desc.en: Spouses and Partners Forum, relocation benefits, dual career support, and partner employment.
desc.es: Foro de Conyuges y Parejas, beneficios de reubicacion, apoyo de doble carrera y empleo de la pareja.
desc.it: Forum Coniugi e Partner, benefici per il trasferimento, supporto alla doppia carriera e impiego del partner.
desc.fr: Forum des Conjoints et Partenaires, avantages de relocalisation, soutien a la double carriere et emploi du partenaire.

desc.en: CERN Medical Service, infirmary, emergency number 767-4444, HUG hospital, and finding doctors.
desc.es: Servicio Medico del CERN, enfermeria, numero de emergencia 767-4444, hospital HUG y busqueda de medicos.
desc.it: Servizio Medico CERN, infermeria, numero di emergenza 767-4444, ospedale HUG e come trovare medici.
desc.fr: Service Medical du CERN, infirmerie, numero d'urgence 767-4444, hopital HUG et comment trouver un medecin.

desc.en: Day 1 to month 1 at CERN: badge pickup, safety briefing, bank account, housing, transport card, and settling in.
desc.es: Del dia 1 al mes 1 en el CERN: recogida de badge, formacion de seguridad, cuenta bancaria, vivienda, abono de transporte e instalacion.
desc.it: Dal giorno 1 al mese 1 al CERN: ritiro badge, briefing sicurezza, conto bancario, alloggio, abbonamento trasporti e ambientamento.
desc.fr: Du jour 1 au mois 1 au CERN : retrait du badge, briefing securite, compte bancaire, logement, abonnement transport et installation.

desc.en: Hiking, skiing, Lake Geneva, day trips, and CERN outdoor clubs in the Geneva region.
desc.es: Senderismo, esqui, Lago Leman, excursiones de un dia y clubes del CERN al aire libre en la region de Ginebra.
desc.it: Escursioni, sci, Lago di Ginevra, gite di un giorno e club all'aperto del CERN nella regione di Ginevra.
desc.fr: Randonnee, ski, Lac Leman, excursions d'une journee et clubs de plein air du CERN dans la region de Geneve.

desc.en: Managing CHF and EUR: multi-currency accounts, exchange tips, ATM advice, and cross-border budgeting.
desc.es: Gestionar CHF y EUR: cuentas multidivisa, consejos de cambio, cajeros automaticos y presupuesto transfronterizo.
desc.it: Gestire CHF e EUR: conti multivaluta, consigli sul cambio, bancomat e budget transfrontaliero.
desc.fr: Gerer CHF et EUR : comptes multidevises, astuces de change, conseils aux distributeurs et budget transfrontalier.
